WORKAROUND:
This error only occurs with the plugins installed through the update manager. This error does not occur with the plugins downloaded directly:
http://www.eclipse.org/emft/downloads/?project=teneo

Download the plugins from this url and then unzip the downloaded file and copy the plugins to the plugins directory of your eclipse installation.

If I understand your emails on this subject, the issue is that in the SDK zip, you have org.eclipse.emf.teneo.libraries_0.7.5.v200610041055.jar, but if you install via UM, you get org.eclipse.emf.teneo.libraries.jar instead.

This could be a bug in the way that plugin's MANIFEST.MF or build.properties is coded, or perhaps a problem in the UM generation code.

Hi Nick,
Sorry for the confusion, I had renamed the jar file to make it easier for me to manually download from a website I have. The issue is not in the naming, the names were correct. It is that jars contained in a plugin (like log4j-12.8.jar) are unpacked within the plugin.jar (in an obscure directory log4j-12.8) while for the directly downloadable zips the jars are just present as is.

gr. Martin
